sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './CardPage.css' import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import Button1 from '../../SiteButtons/Button1/Button1' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { figureOutDate } from '../../../utils/helperFunctions/figureOutDate' const CardPage = (props) => { const removeItem = (id) => { props.removeProduct(id) } const addInsurance = (item) => { var insurance = true; props.addInsurance(item._id, insurance) } const removeInsurance = (item) => { var insurance = false; props.removeInsurance(item._id, insurance) } const increaseQuantity = (item) => { item.quantity = item.quantity + 1; props.changeQuantity(item._id, item.quantity) } const decreaseQuantity = (item) => { if (item.quantity > 1) { item.quantity = item.quantity - 1; props.changeQuantity(item._id, item.quantity) } } return (
{props.items.length ? <>

Item

Price

Quantity

{props.items.map(item =>

maxi DRESS

A perfect flirty number for Balls and Black Tie.

€{item.price}

{item.quantity}

{ removeItem(item._id) }} src="images/svg/Vector (14).svg" alt="" />

Size:{item.size}

Rental period* {figureOutDate(item.startDate, item.endDate)} days

Dates: {item.startDate}-{item.endDate}

{!item.insurance ? <>
addInsurance(item)} />

Add insurance for this item for €5

This will cover accidental damage (example: zip break) but not unrepairable damage

: <>
{ removeInsurance(item) }} src="images/svg/Vector (14).svg" alt="" />

This product has insurance €5

This will cover accidental damage (example: zip break) but not unrepairable damage

}
)}

Item

Price

Price

maxi DRESS

A perfect flirty number for Balls and Black Tie.

Size: XS{props.items.size}

Rental period* : 7 days

Dates: Mar 17, 2020 - Mar 24, 2020

€61.17

€61.17

Add insurance for this item for €5

This will cover accidental damage (example: zip break) but not unrepairable damage

* Tip: Rent 2nd outfit now and keep both outfits for 14 days in total. Upgrade to 3rd outfit and keep all 3 outfits for 21 days! Wear all outfits for as many times as you want.

Subtotal: €{props.totalPrice}

By proceeding you are agreeing to our Terms & Conditions

:

Ваша Корзина пуста

}
) } export default CardPage
